summary: Diff shows the song picker UI was moved to a fixed top-left position with an English "Choose Song" label and added local-file validation/status display. No diff evidence shows the default background-music.mp3 asset being replaced/updated or any autoplay attempt/fallback behavior being implemented/changed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Set the default background music to the uploaded track starting with "Soch Na Sake" by making it the runtime default audio asset at `frontend/public/assets/background-music.mp3`, keep the local file picker, and show an English status message instructing the user to choose a song if the default asset cannot be loaded.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence of updating/replacing `frontend/public/assets/background-music.mp3`, setting the default source to `/assets/background-music.mp3`, or implementing the specific "default audio unavailable" status messaging behavior. The only code change shown is to the picker component UI.

missing_requirements.requirement: Attempt to auto-play the default track immediately on site open, preserving fallback behavior (Enter gate triggers play attempt; if both fail, show manual "Play Music" button).
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence of autoplay attempt-on-load logic, Enter-gate-triggered playback attempt wiring, or a manual "Play Music" button fallback. The shown code changes are limited to the song picker UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Added client-side file-type validation for uploaded audio with an `alert()` on invalid types.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request adding validation/alerts for chosen files; it only required keeping the local file picker behavior available.

hallucinated_features.description: Added UI display of the selected filename as "Playing: {selectedFileName}".
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in requirements/AC; could be acceptable but is additional functionality beyond moving the picker and setting default/autoplay behavior.
